Primary feature is to take screenshots while being able to emulate different screen resolutions.

Features
 * Take and download screenshot
 * Take screenshot and save to cache
 * Download cached screenshot as zip file batch
 * Change resolution of tab and screenshot taken

Github: https://github.com/Adneths/variable-screenshot
